original_text:
Your relatives, members of your own family—
    even they have betrayed you;
    they have raised a loud cry against you.
Do not trust them,
    though they speak well of you.
korean_text: 네 형제와 아버지의 집이라도 너를 속이며 네 뒤에서 크게 외치나니 그들이 네게 좋은 말을 할지라도 너는 믿지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Your relatives, members of your own family—
sentences.korean_translation: 네 친척들, 네 자기 가족 구성원들—

sentences.original_text: they have raised a loud cry against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 향해 큰 외침을 일으켰다.

sentences.original_text: though they speak well of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그들이 너에 대해 잘 말할지라도.
